_preset_metadata.name: Manual - Local Git Only
_preset_metadata.description: Local Git workflow for developers who want complete Git control. No GitHub integration. Branch creation is manual, but TDD and documentation commits are automated.
_preset_metadata.use_case: Individual developers, local-only development, full Git control required

git_strategy.description: Complete local Git control. No GitHub automation.

branch_creation.description: Manual mode: Branch creation is manual (auto_enabled ignored). User chooses on every SPEC.

automation.notes: Branch creation is manual (user controls). TDD and documentation commits are automatic. No PR creation. Push requires manual confirmation.

hooks.notes: pre_commit: enforce ‚Üí formatting violations block commit (ruff, black must pass). pre_push: warn ‚Üí show warnings but allow push. commit_msg: warn ‚Üí suggest but don't block

commit_style.notes: TDD cycle uses colored emoji prefixes. Example: 'üî¥ RED: Add user authentication tests' ‚Üí 'üü¢ GREEN: Implement basic auth' ‚Üí '‚ôªÔ∏è REFACTOR: Optimize auth logic'

branch_strategy.notes: User creates and manages branches manually. No automatic branch creation from SPEC

step_1_plan.notes: Generates SPEC-XXX in .moai/specs/ but does NOT create branch

step_2_branch_manual.notes: User controls branch creation. Feature branches are optional but recommended

step_3_run.notes: Automatic commits for RED-GREEN-REFACTOR phases. Formatting (ruff, black) is enforced. Commit failures blocked if formatting fails.

step_4_sync.notes: Automatic documentation commit. No PR created (local workflow)

step_5_review.notes: Review all automatic commits before pushing

commands: # OR for main branch (if direct commit)
step_6_push_manual.notes: User controls push timing and target. Pre-push hooks show warnings but don't block.

test_coverage.notes: Target 85% coverage. Enforced during /moai:2-run. Warnings shown but don't block in manual mode.

formatting.notes: Formatting violations block commit (pre_commit: enforce). User must fix formatting before commit succeeds.

security.notes: Basic security checks. User can override with --no-verify (not recommended)

push_strategy.push_prompt: Before pushing, review: git diff origin/main...HEAD
push_strategy.notes: No automatic push. User reviews and manually pushes. Pre-push hooks validate against secret patterns (blocking).

notes.ideal_for: Individual developers who want complete Git control without GitHub automation
notes.collaboration: Not suitable for team collaboration (no GitHub integration)
best_practices: 1. Create feature branches for each SPEC
